item.description:
Come out and enjoy a summer concert on the North Haven Green. Big Shot a Billy Joel Tribute band will be playing as part of the Tuesday night concert series. The band starts at 7:00.

The rain has stopped and the concert is still on at the green. Hopefully the sun will come out Hope you can still make it Fran

The Rain started up again and it is pouring, looks like it maybe a wash out I will take a run to the green if the rain stops but it does not look hopeful

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!
